thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just a hop, skip and a jump to the City
thread.title_full: Just a hop, skip and a jump to the City - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Adrian T
title: Just a hop, skip and a jump to the City
text: The room was spacious and clean. We liked the personal card and snacks we received as a Hilton Honors member. The breakfast was nice treat especially out on the patio overlooking the beautiful bay. We had a minor issue with the toilet but it just took one phone call to fix it. We plan on staying here again in the near future.
